sentences.english: There is a mandatory ten percent down payment on all layaway items.
sentences.chinese: 所有分期付款的品项一律要付百分之十头期款。

sentences.english: First time home-buyers only need a down payment of ten percent of the total.
sentences.chinese: 首次购屋者的头期款只需房价的百分之十。
